references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper is foundational for text-to-image diffusion models and is directly referenced by the current work as a highly influential state-of-the-art model.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work is highly influential in providing a high-resolution image synthesis method, which is improved upon in the current paper.
This paper introduces consistency distillation, a crucial technique that the current work builds upon for efficient image generation and inversion.
This paper is foundational in providing the theoretical underpinnings for diffusion probabilistic models, a core technology used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Null-text inversion for editing real images using guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is directly compared with the current work in image inversion and editing tasks, highlighting the advancements made by the proposed method.
